description:
An elite-level helmet that helps you cheat wind as you ride. Benefit from its aerodynamic design and sophisticated retention system. The Safe-T occipital retention systems encircles your whole head, so it doesn't push only at the back and front. In the event of a crash, it allows the helmet to rotate very slightly to absorb energy and reduce the risk of injury. And the integrated MIPS liner adds an extra layer of protection. Super-fine increments on the adjustment wheel bring a new level of bespoke to the fit to this road helmet.

  • MIPS® C-2 technology (Multi-directional Impact Protection System) reduces rotational forces in an oblique impact. An inner shell sandwiched between the foam and the padding reduces the rotational torque on the skull
  • Made of polystyrene foam fused to a polycarbonate shell
  • In-mould construction improves shock absorption and durability
  • Adjustable ultralight straps
  • Retention system dial has horizontal and vertical adjustments
  • Removable, washable pads quickly absorb and disperse perspiration
  • Sunglasses temple ports give you a safe place to stash your glasses
name: MET Estro MIPS Helmet - Unisex
